LanguageData.PowerConduit.label: strømkabel
LanguageData.PowerConduit.description: Et sæt elektriske ledninger som bruges til at transportere strøm rundt. Kan placeres under vægge og andre bygninger.
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Blueprint.label: strømkabel (plan)
LanguageData.PowerConduit_Frame.label: strømkabel (bygning)
LanguageData.PowerSwitch.label: strømafbryder
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Blueprint.label: strømafbryder (plan)
LanguageData.PowerSwitch_Frame.label: strømafbryder (bygning)
LanguageData.FueledGenerator.label: generator
LanguageData.FueledGenerator.description: Producerer strøm ved at brænde træ. Skal genopfyldes manuelt.
LanguageData.FueledGenerator_Blueprint.label: generator (plan)
LanguageData.FueledGenerator_Frame.label: generator (bygning)
LanguageData.Battery.label: batteri
LanguageData.Battery.description: Opmagasinerer elektricitet når der produceres overskydende strøm og aflader når der er for lidt. Advarsel - batterier kan overophede når de er varme eller bliver våde.
LanguageData.Battery_Blueprint.label: batteri (plan)
LanguageData.Battery_Blueprint_Install.label: batteri (plan)
LanguageData.Battery_Frame.label: batteri (bygning)
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.label: solcellegenerator
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.description: Producerer elektricitet fra sollys. Virker ikke i mørke.
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Blueprint.label: solcellegenerator (plan)
LanguageData.SolarGenerator_Frame.label: solcellegenerator (bygning)
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.label: geotermisk generator
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.description: Producerer elektricitet fra geotermiske dampgejsere. Skal placeres på en gejser.
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Blueprint.label: geotermisk generator (plan)
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator_Frame.label: geotermisk generator (bygning)

LanguageData.PowerConduit.label: power conduit
LanguageData.PowerConduit.description: A bundle of electrical cables for moving power around. Can be placed under walls and other buildings.
LanguageData.Blueprint_PowerConduit.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_PowerConduit.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.WaterproofConduit.label: waterproof conduit
LanguageData.WaterproofConduit.description: Insulated electrical cables for transmitting power under shallow water.
LanguageData.Blueprint_WaterproofConduit.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_WaterproofConduit.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.PowerSwitch.label: power switch
LanguageData.Blueprint_PowerSwitch.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_PowerSwitch.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.label: wood-fired generator
LanguageData.WoodFiredGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming wood. Must be periodically loaded with wood fuel by hand.
LanguageData.Blueprint_WoodFiredGenerator.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_WoodFiredGenerator.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: chemfuel powered generator
LanguageData.ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming chemfuel. Must be periodically refueled by hand.
LanguageData.Blueprint_ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_ChemfuelPoweredGenerator.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.WindTurbine.label: wind turbine
LanguageData.WindTurbine.description: A wind-powered electrical generator. Requires a large clear space in front and behind for optimal air flow.
LanguageData.Blueprint_WindTurbine.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_WindTurbine.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.Battery.label: battery
LanguageData.Battery.description: Stores electricity for later use. Charged batteries explode when exposed to rain or fire.
LanguageData.Blueprint_Battery.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Blueprint_Install_Battery.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_Battery.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.label: solar generator
LanguageData.SolarGenerator.description: Produces electricity from sunlight. Does not work in the dark or under artificial light.
LanguageData.Blueprint_SolarGenerator.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_SolarGenerator.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.label: geothermal generator
LanguageData.GeothermalGenerator.description: Produces electricity from geothermal steam geysers. Must be placed on a steam geyser.
LanguageData.Blueprint_GeothermalGenerator.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_GeothermalGenerator.label: FrameLabelExtra
LanguageData.WatermillGenerator.label: watermill generator
LanguageData.WatermillGenerator.description: Produces electricity from river. Must be placed with its wheel in moving water. If watermills are placed too close together, the turbulence they generated and reduces each other's power generation.
LanguageData.Blueprint_WatermillGenerator.label: BlueprintLabelExtra
LanguageData.Frame_WatermillGenerator.label: FrameLabelExtra
